title: Space Engineers v01.018.021 [Portable Steam Rip]
description:
Space Engineers v01.018.021 [Portable Steam Rip]

64bit Multiplayer (including support via Tunngle/Hamatchi) is NOT supported in this release and is almost certainly NOT going to be supported in the future. If you want 64bit Multiplayer, buy the game and support the devs. 32bit Multiplayer via Tunngle/Hamatchi IS potentially possible, as is LAN play, however none of these methods have been officially tested. As such, getting multiplayer to work via Tunngle, Hamatchi, etc is entirely up to you. If you find a way to make it work, feel free to leave a comment to help others out.

Two step run process.
1. Extract using 7zip, WinRar or an archiver of the same variety.
2. Run

* No Installation
* No Crack
* No Steam
* No Hassle

You need to have .NET Framework 4.0 installed. Link below. <a href="
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718</a>

Seed for others once your download completes; it makes everyone's lives more beautiful.

Support the devs if you enjoyed!

Notes

* 32bit Multiplayer is potentially possible via Hamachi, Tunngle or a similar service. Getting it to work is entirely up to you.
* NO MULTIPLAYER SUPPORT FOR THE 64BIT VERSION
* Direct Steam Rip. All content (excluding the .NET Framework 4.0, DotNet 4.0 and the 2010/2012 vcredist Redistributables) is included
* 64bit Readme included
* Top 30 Steam Workshop Maps (as of mid Feb 2014) included - installation readme included
* The Steam Workshop is Disabled
* Portable Release (can be stored and played on a memory device)



~~~01.018.021 Changelog~~~

Update 01.018.021 has been released. You can now create custom colors for blocks, change the gravity generatorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s range settings and rename most of the objects that are available on the Control Panel (gyroscope, refinery, etc.).
We have also synchronized the ship systems in multiplayer and added a construction deck (magnetic deck) on the platform when starting a new game (world).

Features
- create custom colors for blocks (default by P key, SHIFT+P is color picker)
- configurable range of gravity generator
- multiplayer synchronization of ship systems - Lights, spotlight, motors, landing gears and the other functional blocks that can be used on ships are now synchronized
- rename most of the objects that are available on the Control Panel (gyroscope, refinery, etc.)
- added a construction deck (magnetic deck) on the platform when starting a new game (world)
- added a second (back) entrance to small ship cockpit
- renamed thrusts to thrusters
- renamed reflector light to spotlight
- added passage block (replaces the ladder block)

Fixes
- minor performance optimizations
- fixed slowdown on some systems caused by timer frequency
- fixed explosion lags
- fixed explosion particle effect
- fixed projectile damage dealt to heavy armor (now it's more durable)
- fixed physical shape of drill
- fixed missiles ghosting through ship which launched it
- fixed mirroring of some blocks
- reduced memory usage when building blocks
